content:
For the last 4 (6?) years I've volunteered at the HIMSS interop showcase, which has exploded in size. Is HL7 doing anything formal to organize a FHIR tour within it?

@Keith Boone you were the one who first dragged me in there ... thoughts?
IHE will be more visible with the Implementation Guides they have on FHIR (aka IHE Profiles).
I would be more interested if anybody is going to have a Patient Empowerment tour thru the Interop showcase.... right?

Symptomatic is published and ready for a Patient Empowerment tour focusing on the Multiple Sclerosis community and other complex conditions.

Also, when is the next HL7 Application Roundtable?

I propose that the patient empowerment confluence page have a listing of patient empowerment apps, including PHR like ones... Limited to FHIR? or Limited to FHIR and CDA? classified by support for SMART-on-FHIR? not clear to what extent we/community can maintain this
